statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 3 , 10 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 10 , -2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 1 , 8 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 6 , -4 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
